data_table.description: Medication Survey Form, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MSRBFLAG
variable.description: 1= if form is present J1 [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRBCY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB01
variable.description: [Reception]. Did you bring the containers of all medications you used in the past two weeks? Q1 [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB02
variable.description: [Reception]. Is this because you forgot, because you have not taken any medications at all in the last two weeks, or because you could not bring your medications? Q2 [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]
variable.value: Forgot or was unable to bring medications

variable.name: MSRB03
variable.description: [Reception]. Could we follow up on this after the visit so that we can get the information from the (other) medication labels? (Explain follow-up options). Q3 [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB04A
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication name and concentration. Q4A [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB04B
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication code number. Q4B [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB04C
variable.description: [Medication records]. Was this medication prescribed for you, over-the-counter, or shared? Q4C [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB04D
variable.description: [Medication records]. Did you take this medication in the past 24 hours? Q4D [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB05A
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication name and concentration Q5A [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB24A
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: high blood pressure. Q24A [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB24B
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: angina or chest pain. Q24B [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB24C
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: control of heart rhythm. Q24C [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB24D
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: heart failure. Q24D [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB24E
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: blood thinning. Q24E [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB24F
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: diabetes or high blood sugar. Q24F [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB24G
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: stroke. Q24G [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB24H
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: leg pain when walking. Q24H [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB25
variable.description: [Interview]. During the past two weeks, did you take any aspirin, Alka-Seltzer, cold medicine, or headache powder? Q25 [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB26
variable.description: [Interview]. During the Past two weeks, did you take any [other] medication for arthritis, fever, or muscle aches and pains, (or menstrual cramps)? Q26 [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: MSRB28
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Interviewer code number. Q28 [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Medication Survey Form, exam 2]
